name: Nephila Clavata
skill: Deals 979/ DMG to further enemies; decreases targets' speed by 24% for a limited time.
ability: Normal attacks moderately decrease the current target's ATK speed.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a spider woman who used to attack human settlements, possessing and killing young men. Lately she's been doing some soul-searching and decided to devote herself to helping humans instead. In her former life she used to love chasing men, and she still finds herself having salacious thoughts from time to time, but now she has vowed to have more restraint when it comes to the opposite sex. She made this decision after breaking up with a certain man she met... but that's another story.

main: "If you're happy, that's all that matters..."
summon: "I hope you like being tied up."
